WorkItem.Description:
I am having problems with the program when calculating whats best for me.
I get these 2 problems (that I've seen):
When I choose hands it shows that my t10(251lvl item) is better than a t10(264lvl item)
When I choose wrist it shows that the wrist i crafted(247lvl item) is better than both Polar bracers from hc 25 and tokkar from normal 25 (I checked on the EJ spreadsheet and both where better)

Comments.Message: It's trying to meet your Meta
that doenst make sense mate cause the gems i put for my meta doesnt make lesser t10 better than higher t10
but it does answer your second question. The first is a separate issue.
And since you didn't attach your char file like it says in teh Posting Guidelines, lord knows when we could try to answer the other one.

What Jothay is referring to is your current "Chaotic" Meta requires 2 Blue to activate (which you meet at the cost of some slot bonuses, such as putting pussiant in wrist instead of chest or legs). If you put a "Relentless" in your helm you lose 5 DPS but ALL the items you listed are now in a seemingly appropriate place in list. I am posting your toon for you so others can help you out more if you still don't understand. 

Other items of note are your actual gemming choices so I ask a favor:
 Replace Chaotic with Relentless (~5 DPS loss) and Pussiant with Inscribed (~15 DPS gain) for a 9-10 Dps gain with 2 gem swaps
(not sure why you are gemming so much ArP but Rawr shows better DPS using Inscribed (yellow slots) and Bold (red slots) gems)

BTW by following Rawr gemming recommendations you went from 4585 DPS to 4622 DPS and still kept the Chaotic Meta, but that DPS could change drastically since you also have no buffs selected. (in fact I got you near 1300 DPS more by selecting some "standard" buffs and giving you both drums)

Thank you all for your comments I see now the gems are affecting the program and it should be something to look out in the future because I tried changing by hand and at the moment I put t10hc manually it calculated correctly. Something in the program is not wright. If you swap some of my gear around I still get sometimes that t10 lesser is better than t10 higher.. Some problem with the code or something.

About my gear thank you for all the posts but I'm still tweaking and I'm farming banner of victory so all the gemmed arm pen will give more dps than the set bonuses.
Does this problem (the 251 showing higher than 264) persist in 2.3.19? I see the image was from 2.3.15 which means it was pretty old at this point.
